title: Ryuuk Gaming Console Gaming Channel Website

requirements.summary: Create a homepage with hero section, channel description, and call-to-action to explore content
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays Ryuuk Gaming branding prominently
Hero section includes channel tagline and visual appeal
Clear navigation to other sections of the site

file_operations.description: Set up routing with Home as the main landing page and configure navigation to games, videos, about, and contact sections

Create homepage with hero section featuring the generated hero banner image (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png), channel description, and call-to-action buttons linking to games and videos sections
Create site navigation component with links to Home, Games, Videos, About, and Contact sections, featuring the Ryuuk Gaming logo (frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_400x400.png)
Create layout wrapper component that includes Navigation and applies consistent structure across all pages

requirements.summary: Build a games showcase section displaying featured console games with cover images, titles, and descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Games are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each game shows cover art, title, and description
Games can be added, updated, and removed through the backend

file_operations.description: Create games showcase page that fetches games from backend using getAllGames() and displays them in a responsive grid layout. Use the blob-storage component to handle cover images via ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() for streaming and caching. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create game card component that displays game cover image (using ExternalBlob direct URL), title, and description with hover effects
Create custom hook to fetch and manage games data from backend getAllGames() method

requirements.summary: Create a videos/content section where gaming videos or streams can be featured with thumbnails, titles, and links
acceptanceCriteria: Content items display with thumbnail images
Each item includes title, description, and external link
Content can be managed through backend storage

file_operations.description: Create videos showcase page that fetches videos from backend using getAllVideos() and displays them in a grid. Use the blob-storage component to handle thumbnail images via ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() for efficient display. Each video item links to external videoLink. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create video card component displaying thumbnail (using ExternalBlob direct URL), title, description, and external link button that opens in a new tab
Create custom hook to fetch and manage videos data from backend getAllVideos() method

requirements.summary: Implement an about section explaining the Ryuuk Gaming channel's focus on console gaming, mission, and community
acceptanceCriteria: About section describes the channel's focus and purpose
Section is easily accessible from main navigation
Content is clearly formatted and readable

file_operations.description: Create about page with sections describing Ryuuk Gaming's focus on console gaming, channel mission, and community values. Include engaging typography and layout with the gaming pattern background (frontend/public/assets/generated/gaming-pattern.dim_1200x800.png) for visual interest

requirements.summary: Add a contact or community section with social media links and ways to connect with the gaming channel
acceptanceCriteria: Social media links are prominently displayed
Contact information or connection methods are clear
Links open correctly in new tabs

file_operations.description: Create contact/community page with social media links (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Discord) displayed with icons, ensuring all external links open in new tabs with proper rel attributes
Create reusable social links component with icon buttons for major gaming platforms, can be used in footer and contact page

requirements.summary: Design the website with a gaming-themed aesthetic featuring bold, energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple), dynamic typography, and dark mode styling
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme is bold and gaming-appropriate
Dark theme enhances gaming content visibility
Design is cohesive across all pages

file_operations.description: Configure gaming theme with bold colors avoiding blue and purple (using reds, oranges, greens, yellows), dark background colors, and energetic accent colors. Add custom gaming-focused typography scale and spacing

Apply dark mode base styles, gaming-appropriate font families with bold weights, custom scrollbar styling, and global animations for dynamic feel. Set background to dark with gaming pattern overlay using frontend/public/assets/generated/gaming-pattern.dim_1200x800.png
